section.section: The Commission shall publish each year a report describing the work of the Commission for the previous year, in the detail that the Commission considers appropriate.

text.section:
The Commission may publish pamphlets describing:
the law administered by the Commission; and
subdivision, zoning, and other regulations adopted or enacted by the Commission or the district councils.
The Commission may charge a fee for a publication issued under this section to cover any of the cost of the publication.
